citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3 pm on
18-Apr-17.
Knocked on front door, called cell phone and left message, waited 30 minutes.
